description: This is a Dart source file defining the NotesProvider class, which manages notes state in a Flutter application using ChangeNotifier. It interacts with a NoteRepository to perform CRUD operations with optimistic UI updates and handles loading, error states, and search functionality.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages a list of notes, providing methods to load, add, update, delete, and search notes with optimistic UI updates.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the repository, updating state and handling errors.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a note optimistically to the local state and attempts to persist it via repository; rolls back on failure.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates a note locally and remotely with optimistic UI, rolling back on failure.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note locally and attempts to delete remotely, restoring if deletion fails.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a local search on notes via the repository, updating the notes list and handling errors.
